title: QUADRI - Figaro Link Chain 7 mm in 925 Sterling Silver Italian Bracelet for Men Women - 7 to 9 Inch - Premium Quality Made in Italy Certified - Gift Box Included
features: ✔ [PURE 925 ITALIAN SILVER] 7mm Figaro Link Chain Bracelet - Handmade in our italian laboratory by our best artisans. Sterling silver is hypoallergenic and nickel-free which makes this jewel a great choice for people with very sensitive skin. Bracelet length 7.5",5/16 wide (7mm). Robust and secure lobster clasp closure.

✔ [MADE IN ITALY GUARANTEED] by Italian Government. All our products are authenticated not only with a 925 ITALY trademark but also with the 2692VI manufacturing trademark by the Italian Chamber of Commerce , this mark is granted only to Italian jewelery manufacturing companies.

✔ [PERFECT GIFT FOR MAN/WOMAN] - For yourself or the special one in your life, this elegant Chain makes the ideal gift for the man or woman with a sophisticated sense of fashion. This is a right gift for any anniversary, birthday, wedding, graduation, Christmas, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Valentine's Day and any other holiday.
✔ [GIFT BOX INCLUDED - QUADRI] jewels are delivered in an elegant gift box where you will also find a Guarantee certificate that the product is 100% Made in Italy.
✔ [55 YEARS OF BUSINESS] - the Quadri company has been producing jewelery items in Italy since 1968, handing down the goldsmith tradition from generation to generation.

✔ [ MAINTENANCE ] - Oxidation is a natural occurrence on silver jewellery. To avoid and delay this occurrence, be sure to remove your silver jewelery when cleaning the house, washing hands, using hand lotions or creams, before showering, swimming and all activities of this nature .
description: Our Silver jewelry is cast using .925 silver casting grain.This means that 92.5% of your Quadri silver piece is made of fine silver, while the remaining 7.5% is a careful mixture of alloys that help keep the silver hard so it can best withstand day to day wear.

Because silver is not naturally perfectly bright, we finish all of our silver cast pieces with a special plating called “silvering”,“rhodium” or “gold plating”. Like any plating, “silvering” , “rhodium” and “gold plating” can wear out over time especially when exposed to certain cleaning products, soaps and chemicals. This breakdown of the plating exposes the sterling silver which may tarnish. Tarnishing is a natural occurrence on sterling silver jewelry, and many find the splotchy grayish tone undesirable.Be sure to remove silver jewelry when cleaning, washing hands, and before showering, swimming and all activities of this nature.

Quadri Jewels are intended for adults. They are intended exclusively for aesthetic / decorative use.The company assumes no responsibility for any damage caused by improper use of the object (abrasions, bruises, suffocation, skin irritations, etc.)
